item.description:
UPDATE:Please come out and support our girls Susanna and Becca ,both memebrs of Fun w/ A ! Show starts at 10:30PM (after the dinner rush 8 - 10PM)


back by popular demand.....The Cello Chix

9:30 PM Dinner to get a good table, Later arrival expect standing room only..Get there early!

10:30 PM Show at The Plough and Stars
912 Mass Ave. (btw Harvard & Central Sq.), Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139

Closer to Central Square T stop, walk toward Harvard Square about 4 blocks, on the corner of Hancock St and Mass Ave

This is a funky neighborhood Irish Pub that only the locals know about ( I go there with my parents for Sunday brunch to catch up on all of the local gossip).....come see why we keep this place our a secret!

Cost: $3
item.name: Cello Chix @ Plough and Stars Pub in Central Square
